long_description: With fabric that your skin will love, a flattering deep V-neck and a cozy hood, the women's prAna Rapture Hoodie has everything you need to recover in style after a tough workout or yoga session. Fabric blend combines the best of both worlds-soft, breathable cotton and smooth, lightweight polyester. Burnout fabric patterned with sublimation print creates a beautiful overall look with eye catching details. Semifitted prAna Rapture Hoodie is not too tight or too loose. Closeout.
short_description: With fabric that your skin will love, a flattering deep V-neck and a cozy hood, the women's prAna Rapture Hoodie has everything you need to recover in style after a tough workout or yoga session.
